name: Very Dumb AI
description:
(I'm not really good at naming things)

Protect the wandering Robot AI from the enemies with your gun! Kill as many enemies as you can. Use powerups that will appear randomly around the map.

Made for the Wowie Jam 4.0

I'll upload the devlog on my Youtube channel so be sure to subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/Kofybrek
